smartservices.title: Fire & Security Systems
smartservices.description: We offer safe, reliable, and technically superior Fire & Security systems. These ensure safety and peace of mind for our customers and their assets and property.

solutions.title: Solutions
solutions.description: We design, supply install, certify and maintain, reliable systems as per industry safety standards for faster responsiveness to potential emergencies. Our solutions are proven in-use for various applications across multiple sectors.

faqsContent.title: WHY US
faqsContent.subtitle: 24X7X365 DAYS OF SERVICE FOR ALL YOUR NEEDS
faqsContent.description: DAFOOS provides end-to-end design, erection and commissioning and maintenance of both active and passive Fire Protection Systems, and Security Systems. We offer 24x7x365 days service, we think ahead of the industry – DAFOOS was the first organization in the region to impart training to the end users in effective Fire Prevention. We take pride in our well-trained engineers and technicians and the premium quality products that we deploy and our highly satisfied and well-retained customer-base. We bring to you “safe, minimum fire hazard” workplaces and living facilities.
